manifest_description.message: Sporran. The wallet for your KILTs and credentials.

component_IdentitySuccessOverlay_message.message: You have successfully created a KILT Identity
You have successfully imported your KILT Identity
You have successfully set a new password

component_PasswordField_remember.message: Remember password for the next 15 minutes

component_CredentialCard_delete_warning.message: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?

component_CredentialCard_delete_explanat.message: If you have created a backup of this credential, you can restore it at any time.

component_CredentialCard_revoked_delete_.message: Deleting this credential will remove it from your Sporran wallet.

component_CredentialCard_download_info.message: Backing up your credential saves it to your computer. This is the only way to restore your credential in the event of its loss.

component_CredentialCard_presentation_in.message: Create a version of your credential to save and share

component_LegacyDids_explanation.message: We are updating DIDs for initial users, to reset the DID encryption feature for messaging in the future.

component_LegacyDids_cta.message: Please update your DIDs by initiating a transaction for each one that you set up. We have already refunded the transaction fee to you.

component_UnknownIdentity_text.message: The identity $address$ is not recognized by Sporran.

component_UnknownIdentity_info.message: This operation is only supported for identities existing in Sporran.

view_Welcome_noIdentities.message:
You currently don’t have any Identities.
Add your first Identity to get started.

view_Welcome_agree.message: I have read and agree to the

view_Welcome_import.message: Import an Identity from pre-existing phrase

view_Warning_emphasis.message: The next step is very important!

view_Warning_explanation.message: Please write down your wallet’s phrase and keep it in a safe place. We recommend that you write down your backup phrase with pen and paper. The phrase is required to restore your Identity.

view_Warning_emphasis_again.message:
Keep it safe, so you don’t lose
your assets

view_Warning_CTA.message: I understand this – go to the phrase

view_SaveBackupPhrase_explanation.message: Click or hover over each word and write it down. You need to write the words in the correct order from 1 to 12.

view_VerifyBackupPhrase_explanation.message: To make sure you wrote down your backup phrase accurately, sort your phrase in the correct order from 1 to 12.

view_VerifyBackupPhrase_error.message: Please put every word in the correct order

view_ImportBackupPhrase_explanation_impo.message: To import a KILT Identity, you will need your backup phrase consisting of 12 words.

view_ImportBackupPhrase_explanation_rese.message: In order to set a new password you have to re-enter your backup phrase

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_invalid_ba.message: The entered backup phrase doesn’t exist

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_mismatched.message: This is not the backup phrase of this Identity

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_backup_phr.message: Please insert all 12 words of the backup phrase in the correct order

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_typo.message: It looks like there’s a typo in this word

view_CreatePassword_explanation.message: You need a secure password for every Identity. A strong password looks like this:

view_CreatePassword_error_cases.message: You need to use both uppercase and lowercase letters

view_CreatePassword_error_numbers.message: You need to use at least one number

view_CreatePassword_error_other.message: You need to use at least one special character

view_CreatePassword_error_length.message: You need to use at least $minimum$ characters

view_IdentityOverview_download_prompt.message: Some credentials have not been backed up

view_RemoveIdentity_subline.message: You’re about to remove your Identity

view_RemoveIdentity_explanation.message: The next step will remove your Identity from the browser extension. This will not delete your Identity. You can add it again any time by importing your backup phrase.

view_SendToken_amount_invalid.message: The value entered is not a number

view_SendToken_amount_large.message: The amount entered exceeds your maximum transferable amount

view_SendToken_error_existential_recepie.message: Cannot send less than the existential deposit

view_SendToken_fee_large.message: The amount+costs exceed your maximum transferable amount

view_SendToken_recipient_invalid.message: The address is invalid. Please check it again.

view_SendToken_recipient_same.message: The recipient address is the same as Identity address

view_SendToken_offline.message: Cannot connect to the network. Please check your internet connection.

view_SignQuote_subline.message: Choose an Identity for your credential

view_SignQuote_subline_predetermined.message: The credential will be issued to this Identity

view_SignQuote_on_chain_did_deleted.message: DID deleted, please select a different Identity

view_SaveCredential_warning.message: Please back up your credential now!

view_ShareCredentialSelect_subline.message: Select a credential to sign and share

view_ShareCredentialSelect_confirm_info.message: You are in the process of presenting a revoked credential. Do you still want to continue?

view_ShareCredentialSign_subline.message: Check the information you’re about to share

view_ShareCredentialSign_error.message: The selected credential has not been attested.

view_AppSettings_warning.message:
When changing the endpoint, the extension needs to close.
Just start it again to continue.

view_AppSettings_attention.message: Attention: connecting to a malicious endpoint may expose your Identities.

view_AuthorizeDApp_subline.message: An application called $name$ is requesting access from:

view_AuthorizeDApp_warning.message: Only approve this request if you trust the application. Approving gives the application access to the addresses of your Identities.

view_ExternalAccess_subline.message: Control which websites can access your Identity names and addresses

view_ExistentialWarning_subline.message: Your Identity’s remaining balance will be set to zero

view_ExistentialWarning_warning.message: This transaction would leave your balance below the existential deposit. Therefore the balance of your Identity will be set to zero. The rest of your transferable balance will be added as a tip. Confirm to proceed with this transaction anyway.

view_GenericError_message.message: An error occurred; please try again. For help please contact tech-support@sporran.org and send over the following text in full.

view_DidUpgrade_deposit_explainer.message: A deposit is needed to create your DID. The deposit will be refunded if you remove your DID.

view_DidUpgradeEuro_info.message: After signing you will go to the checkout page to pay with

view_DidDowngrade_subline.message: Remove DID from the KILT blockchain

view_DidDowngrade_insufficientFunds.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs to pay the fee

view_DidDowngrade_explanation.message: Take care: this identity won’t be able to get a DID again.

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_functionality.message: Enables you to sign with your DID and use new functionality

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_deposit.message: A deposit is needed to create your DID. The deposit will be refunded if you remove your DID.

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_onchain_deleted.message: You deleted your DID and can no longer use this feature. To start using a DID, please create a new identity.

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_kilt_explainer.message: For creating a DID, KILT Coins are needed to pay for the transaction and for the deposit. The deposit will be refunded if you remove your DID.

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_euro.message: Use Checkout Service and pay with Paypal $cost$ (service fee, including VAT) or EUR equivalent, depending on your preferred PayPal currency

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_euro_explainer.message: You pay a fixed fiat rate and BTE in return takes over handling the necessary KILT payments for you. There are no refunds when removing your DID.

view_DidUpgradeExplainer_insufficientKil.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs (deposit + fee)

view_DidDowngradeWarningCredentials_subl.message: Remove DID from the KILT blockchain

view_DidDowngradeWarningCredentials_warn.message: Attention! This will render the following credentials unusable:

view_DidDowngradeWarningWeb3Name_subline.message: Remove DID from the KILT blockchain

view_DidDowngradeWarningWeb3Name_warning.message: Attention! Removing your DID will also remove your web3name:

view_DidDowngradeWarningWeb3Name_explana.message: Please note: if you remove your web3name, it can be claimed by someone else.

view_DidEndpointsForm_unsaved.message: Clicking OK will cause unsaved form data to be lost

view_DidEndpointsForm_tooMany.message: You cannot add any more service endpoints

view_DidEndpointsForm_tooLong.message: This string is $current$ bytes; the maximum allowed is $maximum$.

view_DidEndpointsSign_insufficientFunds.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs to pay the fee

view_DidEndpointsSign_add_pending.message: The new service endpoint is being created

view_DidEndpointsSign_add_success.message: The new service endpoint has been added

view_DidEndpointsSign_add_error.message: Adding the new service endpoint failed

view_DidEndpointsSign_remove_pending.message: The service endpoint is being removed

view_SignDidStart_subline.message: Select your Identity and sign with your password

view_SignDidStart_info_did.message: To proceed you need a DID.

view_SignDidStart_info_credentials.message: Choose whether to attach your credentials to the signature, or sign without credentials.

view_SignDidStart_error_credentials.message: This identity has no attested credentials

view_SignDidCredentialsSelect_subline.message: Select credentials to attach to your signature

view_ImportCredentials_subline.message: To import your credentials you need your backup files

view_ImportCredentials_wrongFormatInfo.message: Please make sure to upload only JSON files that were previously backed up from your Sporran.

view_ImportCredentials_unknownIdentityIn.message: You uploaded a credential for an identity that is currently not in your Sporran. Please add this identity first and import the credential again.

view_ImportCredentials_unexpectedErrorIn.message: An unexpected error happened. Please try again.

view_DidRepair_info.message:
This transaction updates your DID.
The fee has already been refunded.

view_DidRepair_insufficientFunds.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs to update your DID

view_W3NCreateInfo_subline.message: Claim a custom name to represent your DID

view_W3NCreateInfo_info.message: web3name is a custom name you create to represent your DID and personalize your digital identity. web3names can be linked via your DID with your SocialKYC credentials and with addresses across multiple blockchains.

view_W3NCreateInfo_warning.message: You need a DID to use this feature.

view_W3NCreateForm_subline.message: Claim a custom name to represent your DID

view_W3NCreateForm_info.message:
Choose your unique web3name.
Use only these characters for your web3name:
lowercase a to z, 0 to 9, “-” and “_”

view_W3NCreateForm_short.message: You need to use at least $minimum$ characters

view_W3NCreateForm_long.message: You may use at most $maximum$ characters

view_W3NCreateForm_capital.message: Capital letters are not supported as a part of your web3name

view_W3NCreateForm_taken.message: Too late, this web3name is already taken

view_W3NCreateSign_subline.message: Connect a web3name to your DID

view_W3NCreateSign_explainer.message: A deposit is needed to claim your web3name. The deposit will be refunded if you remove your web3name.

view_W3NCreateSign_insufficientFunds.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs to create the web3name

view_W3NCreateSignEuro_cost.message: After signing you will be directed to the Checkout Service and pay with PayPal (total cost: $cost$)

view_W3NRemove_subline.message: Remove web3name from the KILT blockchain

view_W3NRemove_insufficientFunds.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs to pay the fee

view_W3NRemove_explanation.message: Please note: if you remove your web3name, it can be claimed by someone else.

view_SignDidExtrinsic_subline.message: Select your Identity and sign with your password

view_SignDidExtrinsic_error_light_did.message: You need to create a DID first

view_SignDidExtrinsic_error_unusable_did.message: This identity’s DID has been removed and is unusable

view_SignDidExtrinsic_endpoint_remove_er.message: No service endpoint found for DID

view_W3NCreateChoose_info.message:
Claim a web3name to represent your DID.
Fees for creating your web3name may be paid in KILT Coins or via PayPal.

view_W3NCreateChoose_euro.message: Use Checkout Service and pay with PayPal $cost$ (service fee, including VAT) or EUR equivalent, depending on your preferred PayPal currency

view_W3NCreateChoose_insufficientKilt.message: You need at least $cost$ KILTs (deposit + fee)
